alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:29AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN CLAY AND NORTHEASTERN DUNKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 900 AM CST... At 829 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rector, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Malden, Piggott, Campbell, Rector, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Clarkton, Holcomb, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, Saint Francis, Crockett, Heubner, Pratt, Carryville, Rhyne, Hargrave Corner, Valley Ridge, Chalk Bluff Battlefield Park, and Baird. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
